item.title: Geo-Neus中renderer代码的具体解读
item.author: Hanqi Jiang
item.description: get_psnr 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 def get_psnr(img1, img2, normalize_rgb=False): if normalize_rgb: # [-1,1] --> [0,1] img1 = (img1 + 1.) / 2. img2 = (img2 + 1. ) / 2. mse = torch.mean((img1 - img2) ** 2) psnr = -10. * torch.log(mse) / torch.log(torch.Tensor([10.]).cuda()) return psnr 这个函数计算两张图像img1和img2
